title: Supplier Diversity Management System (SDMS)
description: Created and maintained a corporate website, ensuring compliance with ADA, WCAG 2.0 AA, and WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility standards. This project was developed using .NET Core, C#, HTML5, CSS3, jQuery, Bootstrap, and MS SQL. It also integrated two-factor authentication (2FA) protocols to enhance security. Additionally, front-end enhancements were implemented to improve user experience and accessibility, especially for color-blind users.

title: Ganga Kalyana Application
description: A government initiative designed to provide borewells to economically disadvantaged members of the Backward Class community. This application ensures proper allocation and utilization of funds to support sustainable water access in underserved areas.

title: Health and Nutrition Survey Application
description: A comprehensive survey platform aimed at collecting health and nutrition data from 6.6 crore citizens in Karnataka. The data gathered supports governmental planning and policy-making to improve public health and nutrition programs.

title: Karmani Web Application
description: A specialized platform for collecting and managing data on transgender individuals in Karnataka. This application facilitates the distribution of government benefits and ensures that the needs of the transgender community are adequately addressed.

title: BOCW_CESS Web Application
description: A dedicated platform for managing welfare programs specifically for construction workers in Karnataka. The application focuses on health and safety measures, ensuring that workers receive the support and benefits they need.

title: Project Oversight Application
description: A robust tool designed for managing project schedules, tasks, and assets. This application enhances productivity and time tracking within the company by providing a centralized system for project management and oversight.

title: Asset Management System Mobile Application
description: A mobile application designed for efficient asset tracking, management, and maintenance. Built with React Native for the frontend, C# for the backend, and SQL Server for the database, it includes features such as asset creation, modification, deletion, and detailed reporting for improved asset utilization and oversight.
